amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph stating the Secretary shall provide an opportunity of public comment on the plan for a period of at least 90 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A060) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A060) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
